channel.title: Comments for GitLab Control
channel.description: Brings your projects to your pocket

item.title: Comment on Version 1.24.4 by Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../1-24-4/index.html#comment-1218">Abdurehim</a>.
Hi Abdurehim,
Push notifications have been implemented since January 2017, but unfortunately the GitLab server team is ignoring my requirements to have them work.
As of today is still a no go, as they say there isnâ€™t enough interest from people in order to develop this integration.
You can register your interest here https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-ce/issues/29488
Apologies, that doesn't help your case.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Abdurehim.

Hi Abdurehim,

Push notifications have been implemented since January 2017, but unfortunately the GitLab server team is ignoring my requirements to have them work.

As of today is still a no go, as they say there isnâ€™t enough interest from people in order to develop this integration.

You can register your interest here https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-ce/issues/29488

Apologies, that doesn’t help your case.

item.title: Comment on Version 1.24.4 by Abdurehim
item.dc:creator: Abdurehim
item.description: Hello. I've been using Gitlab Control iOS App for some time now, and I'm planning to upgrade. I want to know one thing though: in the full version, can I get notifications when someone in my team send a commit on the projects I'm participated in? I really need this feature and that's why I want to try the pro version in the first place. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Hello.
I’ve been using Gitlab Control iOS App for some time now, and I’m planning to upgrade. I want to know one thing though: in the full version, can I get notifications when someone in my team send a commit on the projects I’m participated in? I really need this feature and that’s why I want to try the pro version in the first place.
Thanks.

item.title: Comment on Version 1.19.3 by Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../version-1-19-3/index.html#comment-110">Benjamin Behr</a>.
Apple doesn't allow to choose what language the app is on, unless you switch your phone's language from Spanish to English.
Is there anything in the Spanish translation that doesn't make sense?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Benjamin Behr.

Apple doesn’t allow to choose what language the app is on, unless you switch your phone’s language from Spanish to English.

Is there anything in the Spanish translation that doesn’t make sense?

item.title: Comment on Version 1.19.3 by Benjamin Behr
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Behr
item.description: Thanks for the update. I like the spanish translation but how do I switch back to english?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the update. I like the spanish translation but how do I switch back to english?

item.title: Comment on Version 1.18.0 by Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../version-1-18-0/index.html#comment-89">Ioannis Kappas</a>.
Thanks for the heads up! It's already fixed and it will be released with 1.18.1.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ioannis Kappas.

Thanks for the heads up! It’s already fixed and it will be released with 1.18.1.

item.title: Comment on Version 1.18.0 by Ioannis Kappas
item.dc:creator: Ioannis Kappas
item.description:
Thanks for this great app.
There is a bug on the settings page that prohibits the selection of the syntax highlighter theme.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for this great app.

There is a bug on the settings page that prohibits the selection of the syntax highlighter theme.

item.title: Comment on Version 1.17.1 by Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../version-1-17-1/index.html#comment-73">Jordi Llonch</a>.
Yes, CI builds are on the roadmap, but priority at the moment is on push notifications.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jordi Llonch.

Yes, CI builds are on the roadmap, but priority at the moment is on push notifications.

item.title: Comment on Version 1.17.1 by Jordi Llonch
item.dc:creator: Jordi Llonch
item.description:
Thanks for this amazing app.
Any plans to support CI builds?
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for this amazing app.

Any plans to support CI builds?
